Summary: 1 foot round ball of light that came right to me and then moved 100 yrs in 1 second
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gulfport
There were no other sightings in Gulfport on or around June 8th 2001
divs: Sighting Detailsi was fishing at a pond were i used to live one night about 10 or 11 at night. i was just looking on the otherside of the pond and noticed a light starting to glow.all of a sudden it got bright and came within feet from me. sat there stunned for about 5 seconds and as fast as i could blink my eyes it was at the other end of the feild which was over 100 yards long and faded out. no one beleives me.it was about 12 inches in diameter
